title: Physical Layer Overview
content: The physical layer in 5G NR provides the radio interface between the UE and the network. It supports multiple numerologies and flexible frame structures.

title: Numerology
content: Numerology is defined as the subcarrier spacing configuration parameter mu. It determines the spacing between OFDM subcarriers.

title: HARQ
content: HARQ (Hybrid Automatic Repeat Request) is an error correction mechanism that combines forward error correction with automatic repeat request.
